Description: The following statement contains a magic number: var statistics = (from request in requests                                group request by new                                {                                    Milliseconds = Math.Ceiling(request.Duration.TotalMilliseconds * 10) / 10'                                    request.Url                                } into g                                from Count in g.Count()                                select new                                {                                    g.Key.Url'                                    g.Key.Milliseconds'                                    Count                                })                                .ToList();
